comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This cliff is the closest spot in England to France. A recent view at high tide from Flickr user Maarten Otto:: Another modern view, taken from a road above the tunnels, along with detailed information about the cliff and its history by John Latter. The name was inspired by several mentions of the cliff in Shakespeare's King Lear. www.panoramio.com/photo/47887974
